means: 表示某物或某人的存在或某事的发生（常用作be, seem或appear的主语）
（表示满足、烦恼）你瞧，好啦，得啦

sentence.Network_en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

sentence.Network_en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentence.Network_en: There has been a very mixed reaction to the decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于这个决定的反应非常不一致。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express past experience of or familiarity with something, especially something now regarded as boring or unwelcome
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)早就知道，没什么稀奇

jx.jx_en_mean: be available to provide support or comfort for someone, especially at a time of adversity
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指在逆境中）支持（或安慰）某人；与某人站在一起

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)know all about a situation from experience
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)全都知道；直接了解，亲眼看到

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express one's defiance or awareness that someone will not like what one has decided or is saying
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)这是我最后的决定；再没有可说的；没有商量的余地；（事情）就是这样

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express the destruction or failure of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 就这么完蛋了，就这么毁了

lj.lj_ls: 我的职业生涯就这么被断送了。

lj.lj_ly: pretty ridiculous, I know, but there it is.
lj.lj_ls: 我知道很可笑，但事情就是这样。

jx.jx_en_mean: in or very near a particular place or position

phrase.cizu_name: there you are (或 go) informal 非正式

jx.jx_cn_mean: 你瞧；我说对了吧；又能怎么样

lj.lj_ly: there you are! I told you the problem was a political one.
lj.lj_ls: 瞧！我告诉过你这是个政治问题。

lj.lj_ly: sometimes it is embarrassing, but there you go.
lj.lj_ls: 有时这令人尴尬，但没办法。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to criticize someone for behaving in a way that is typical of them
used to emphasize or draw attention to a particular fact

lj.lj_ly: so there you have it — fish and chips were a West country invention.
lj.lj_ls: 因此情况就这样——炸鱼和炸土豆条原本是西式菜肴。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thær, thēr of Germanic origin; related to Dutch daar and German da, also to that and the

encyclopedia.content: there的读音 语法标注解释 there英音：[ðɛə]美音：[ðɛr] there的中文翻译 副词ad. 1. 在那里；到那里；向那里 She lives there. 她住在那里。 2. 在那时；在那点上；在那方面 You've got a point there. 你这句话有道理。 3. 锛堄靡砸鹱⒁猓忧坑锲蕊級瞧，你看 There she is. 瞧，她来了。 There comes the bus. 公共汽车来了。 4. 锛堄攵蔮e连用锛売校涫凳侨康棺啊 The

entry.tran: (作动词 be 的主语，表示存在与否或引起注意)
entry.def: There is used as the subject of the verb 'be' to say that something exists or does not exist, or to draw attention to it.

example.ex: There are roadworks between Camblesforth and Carlton...
example.tran: 坎布斯福斯和卡尔顿之间的道路在施工。

example.ex: Are there some countries that have been able to tackle these problems successfully?...
example.tran: 有没有哪些国家已经能成功解决这些问题了？

entry.tran: (用在某些动词前表示某事物存在、发展或可见，动词的单复数取决于其后的名词)
entry.def: You use there in front of certain verbs when you are saying that something exists, develops, or can be seen. Whether the verb is singular or plural depends on the noun which follows the verb.

example.ex: There remains considerable doubt over when the intended high-speed rail link will be complete...
example.tran: 人们对于拟建的高速铁路何时能竣工仍存有很大疑问。

example.ex: There appeared no imminent danger...
example.tran: 看不出有什么迫在眉睫的危险。

entry.tran: (用于 hello 或 hi 之后作为问候语)
entry.def: There is used after 'hello' or 'hi' when you are greeting someone.

example.ex: 'Hello there,' said the woman, smiling at them. — 'Hi!' they chorused...
example.tran: “嘿，你们好！”那个女人笑着对他们说。——“你好！”他们齐声说。

example.ex: Oh, hi there. You must be Sidney.
example.tran: 喂，你好。你一定是西德尼吧。

entry.tran: 存在地;现有地;可得到地
entry.def: If something is there, it exists or is available.

example.ex: The group of old buildings on the corner by the main road is still there today...
example.tran: 大路拐角处的古老建筑群如今还在。

example.ex: The book is there for people to read and make up their own mind...
example.tran: 书摆在那儿，供人们阅读后再作决定。

entry.tran: 那儿(指已经提及的地方)
entry.def: You use there to refer to a place which has already been mentioned.

example.ex: The next day we drove the 33 miles to Siena (the Villa Arceno is a great place to stay while you are there) for the Palio...
example.tran: 第二天，我们驱车 33 英里来到锡耶纳参加赛马节(此地的阿尔希诺山庄是个好地方，值得一去)。

example.ex: 'Come on over, if you want.' — 'How do I get there?'...
example.tran: “你要想来的话，就过来吧。”——“我怎么去那里？”

entry.tran: 那儿，那边(表示用手指向的或目视的地方)
entry.def: You use there to indicate a place that you are pointing to or looking at, in order to draw someone's attention to it.

example.ex: There it is, on the corner over there...
example.tran: 在那儿呢，在那边那个角上。

example.ex: There she is on the left up there...
example.tran: 她在那边，左边那儿。

entry.tran: (用于 there he was 或 there we were 等表达方式中，用以概括故事或为了制造特殊效果放慢故事的节奏)
entry.def: You use there in expressions such as 'there he was' or 'there we were' to sum up part of a story or to slow a story down for dramatic effect.

example.ex: So there we were with Amy and she was driving us crazy...
example.tran: 就这样，我们和埃米到了一起，而她快把我们逼疯了。

example.ex: I looked, and there he was, riding a horse, with a double barreled shotgun on his shoulder.
example.tran: 我看了看，发现他在那儿，骑着马，肩上扛着一把双筒猎枪。

entry.tran: …在吗(电话用语)
entry.def: You use there when speaking on the telephone to ask if someone is available to speak to you.

example.ex: Hello, is Gordon there please?
example.tran: 喂，请问戈登在吗？

entry.tran: 在那一点上(指别人谈话中的某个观点)
entry.def: You use there to refer to a point that someone has made in a conversation.

example.ex: Death is terrible. I agree with you there...
example.tran: 死亡很可怕。这点我同意你的观点。

example.ex: I think you're right there John...
example.tran: 约翰，我觉得你这点说对了。

entry.tran: 那里，那儿(指活动、过程已经达到的阶段)
entry.def: You use there to refer to a stage that has been reached in an activity or process.

example.ex: We are making further investigations and will take the matter from there...
example.tran: 我们正在进一步调查，将从那儿入手。

example.ex: And there we end this edition of Science in Action...
example.tran: 本期《科学在行动》到这里就结束了。

entry.tran: (表示取得圆满成功)
entry.def: You use there to indicate that something has reached a point or level which is completely successful.

example.ex: We had hoped to fill the back page with extra news; we're not quite there yet...
example.tran: 我们本来希望补充一些新闻把最后一版填满，可是现在差得还很远。

example.ex: Life has not yet returned to normal but we are getting there.
example.tran: 生活还没有恢复正常，不过就快了。

entry.tran: 别无他法;无计可施;只能这样了
entry.def: You can use there in expressions such as there you go or there we are when accepting that an unsatisfactory situation cannot be changed.

example.ex: I'm the oldest and, according to all the books, should be the achiever, but there you go...
example.tran: 我岁数最大，无论怎么说，都应该有所成就了，可是你看看我这个样子。

example.ex: It's the wages that count. Not over-generous, but there you are...
example.tran: 重要的是工钱，不要过于慷慨，但也没办法。

entry.tran: 我讲的没错吧;我说对了吧
entry.def: You can use there in expressions such as there you go and there we are when emphasizing that something proves that you were right.

example.ex: You see? There you go. That's why I didn't mention it earlier. I knew you'd take it the wrong way...
example.tran: 你看，我说的没错吧？这就是为什么我早没提。我就知道你会误解。

example.ex: 'There you are, you see!' she exclaimed. 'I knew you'd say that!'...
example.tran: “你看看，我说对了吧！”她叫道，“我就知道你要那么说。”

entry.tran: 话说回来;再说了;不过
entry.def: You use there again to introduce an extra piece of information which either contradicts what has been said or gives an alternative to it.

example.ex: At 18 stone, I can't run around the way I used to. There again, some people say I never did...
example.tran: 我现在体重18英石，不能像从前那样跑来跑去了;不过有人说我以前就跑不动。

example.ex: I mean small cars are the answer surely. Or there again a good system of public transport might do the same thing.
example.tran: 我是说小汽车肯定是解决之道，不过良好的公交系统或许也能解决问题。

entry.tran: 又来了;又来这套
entry.def: Phrases such as there you go again are used to show annoyance at someone who is repeating something that has annoyed you in the past.

example.ex: 'There you go again, upsetting the child!' said Shirley...
example.tran: “瞧，又来了不是？又惹孩子伤心！”雪莉说。

example.ex: 'There you go again, Dad, with your silly words.' — 'Sorry, son.'...
example.tran: “爸爸，又来了吧，又说傻话了。”——“对不起，儿子。”

entry.tran: 就这样定了;别说了
entry.def: You can add 'so there' to what you are saying to show that you will not change your mind about a decision you have made, even though the person you are talking to disagrees with you.

example.ex: 'Take That' are the best group in the whole world. So there...
example.tran: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

example.ex: I think that's sweet, so there.
example.tran: 我看那样很好，就这么定了。

entry.tran: 立即;立刻
entry.def: If something happens there and then or then and there, it happens immediately.

example.ex: Many felt that he should have resigned there and then...
example.tran: 许多人觉得他应该当场辞职。

example.ex: There and then he made his decision...
example.tran: 他当时就做出了决定。

entry.tran: 好了，好了(用于安慰他人，尤其是儿童)
entry.def: You say 'there there' to someone who is very upset, especially a small child, in order to comfort them.

example.ex: 'There, there,' said Mum. 'You've been having a really bad dream.'
example.tran: “好了，好了，”妈妈说，“你只是做了一个很可怕的噩梦。”

entry.tran: 给你;拿去吧
entry.def: You say 'there you are' or 'there you go' when you are offering something to someone.

example.ex: Nora picked up the boy, and gave him a biscuit. 'There you are, Lennie, you take the nice biscuit.'
example.tran: 诺拉抱起那个男孩，给他一块饼干，说：“伦尼，给，拿着这块好吃的饼干。”

entry.tran: (尤指困难时)帮助，支持
entry.def: If someone is there for you, they help and support you, especially when you have problems.

example.ex: Despite what happened in the past I want her to know I am there for her.
example.tran: 无论过去发生过什么，我希望她知道，我是支持她的。

means.word_mean: 1. a location other than here; that place;
3. to or toward that place; away from the speaker;

list.explanation: 情况就同我向你说的一样。瞧，我不是说对了吗？

example.en: There you go，the prices went up again!
example.zh: 瞧，不出所料，价格又涨上去了!

list.explanation: 你又在这样干了。你还是老一套

example.en: I just told you not to put that junk on the table and there you go.
example.zh: 我才对你说过，别把那种破烂东叫放在桌上,而你又放了。

auth_sentence.content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is one problem with this approach, though.

auth_sentence.content: But the city hopes to stop the decline there.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the city hopes to stop the decline there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the city hopes to stop the decline there.

auth_sentence.content: There's been a big age and experience gap.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's been a big age and experience gap.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's been a big age and experience gap.

Sentence.sentence: Ask me in 2020 There is little that can be done to stop population ageing, so the world will have to live with it

sentences.en: We like the restaurant so much that we're going to eat there next time.
sentences.cn: 我们很喜欢那家餐厅, 所以下次还要去那里。

sentences.en: The girls there can sing and dance.
sentences.cn: 那里的女孩子都能歌善舞。

means.word_mean: 在那一点上, 关于那一点

sentences.en: There I have to disagree with you.
sentences.cn: 在那一点上我不能同意你的意见。

means.word_mean: (用于表示某物或某人的存在或某事的发生, 常用作be, seem或appear的主语)

sentences.en: There are a wall and a tree behind the house.
sentences.cn: 房子后面有一堵墙和一棵树。

sentences.en: There appears to be a mistake.

jushi.english: The girls there can sing and dance.
jushi.chinese: 那里的女孩子都能歌善舞。

jushi.english: We liked the restaurant so much that we're going to eat there next time.
jushi.chinese: 我们很喜欢那家餐厅,所以下次还要去那里。

jushi.english: There I have to disagree with you.
jushi.chinese: 在那一点上我不能同意你的意见。
